snippet.title: Fail to Win Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Download it for free now at https://tykenn.itch.io/fail-to-win-chapter-1

Fail to Win is a game where you win by losing in all the right ways. Puzzles center around getting blown up and re-spawning.

It includes four stages of challenges and puzzles. The whole thing should last about 30-60 minutes for the average player. We're excited to have people try this out, because the goal is to make a full-length game.

Also, join our feedback discord: https://discord.gg/VTn38aw
